Interface RFIDDatabaseManager


  • public interface RFIDDatabaseManager
    Since:
    January 28, 2015
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Sean Spurlin RFIDDatabaseManager is a generic interface for interacting with a database. I based it off a database helper that I used for an android project so it might not be entirely correct for this application. Feel free to correct it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Function: close Precondition: Connection to database is currently established Postcondition: Connection to database is severed
      boolean deleteTag(TagWrapper tag)
      Function: deleteTag Precondition: Tag matching the input Tag exists within the database Postcondition: Tag and associated information has been deleted from the database
      void dropTable(java.lang.String tableName)
      Function: dropTable Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: Table which shares the same as the input is dropped from the database along with any data belonging to entries in the dropped table
      java.util.List<TagWrapper> getAllTags()
      Function: getAllTags Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: All tags have been retrieved from the database
      TagWrapper getTag(long id)
      Function: getTag Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: Tag associated with the input id has been retrieved from the database
      void initializeTable(java.lang.String tableName)
      Function: initializeTable Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: Table with the same name as the input String is initialized with default information
      boolean insertTag(TagWrapper tag)
      Function: insertTag Precondition: tag hasn't doesn't exist in the database Postcondition: tag exists in the database
      void open()
      Function: open Precondition: Connection to database hasn't been established Postcondition: Connection to database is established
      boolean updateTag(TagWrapper tag)
      Function: updateTag Precondition: Tag exists in the database and the input tag has more up-to-date information Postcondition: Tag entry in the database matches the information of the input tag

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
        Function: open Precondition: Connection to database hasn't been established Postcondition: Connection to database is established

      • close

        void close()
        Function: close Precondition: Connection to database is currently established Postcondition: Connection to database is severed

      • insertTag

        boolean insertTag(TagWrapper tag)
        Function: insertTag Precondition: tag hasn't doesn't exist in the database Postcondition: tag exists in the database
        Parameters:
        tag - RFID Tag which hasn't been added to the database
        Returns:
        True if the insertion was successful, False otherwise

      • updateTag

        boolean updateTag(TagWrapper tag)
        Function: updateTag Precondition: Tag exists in the database and the input tag has more up-to-date information Postcondition: Tag entry in the database matches the information of the input tag
        Parameters:
        tag - RFID Tag which exists within the database but has more up-to-date information
        Returns:
        True if the update was successful, False otherwise

      • deleteTag

        boolean deleteTag(TagWrapper tag)
        Function: deleteTag Precondition: Tag matching the input Tag exists within the database Postcondition: Tag and associated information has been deleted from the database
        Parameters:
        tag - RFID Tag which exists within the database and is to be deleted along with any other information in the database which belongs to that Tag
        Returns:
        True if the deletion was successful, False otherwise

      • getAllTags

        java.util.List<TagWrapper> getAllTags()
        Function: getAllTags Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: All tags have been retrieved from the database
        Returns:
        A list of all the tags in the database

      • getTag

        TagWrapper getTag(long id)
        Function: getTag Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: Tag associated with the input id has been retrieved from the database
        Parameters:
        id - Key to retrieve the associated Tag from the database; the key is the EPC
        Returns:
        Tag associated with the id

      • dropTable

        void dropTable(java.lang.String tableName)
        Function: dropTable Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: Table which shares the same as the input is dropped from the database along with any data belonging to entries in the dropped table
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table in the database to be dropped

      • initializeTable

        void initializeTable(java.lang.String tableName)
        Function: initializeTable Precondition: Connection to database has been established Postcondition: Table with the same name as the input String is initialized with default information
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table in the database to be filled with default values
